# rapfiles Documentation

This directory contains comprehensive documentation for the `rapfiles` project.

## Feature Documentation

### Core Features
- **[Directory Operations](DIRECTORY_OPERATIONS.md)** - Creating, removing, listing, and walking directories
- **[File Metadata](FILE_METADATA.md)** - Getting file statistics, sizes, and timestamps
- **[File Manipulation](FILE_MANIPULATION.md)** - Copying, moving, renaming, removing, and linking files
- **[Atomic Operations](ATOMIC_OPERATIONS.md)** - Atomic file writes and moves for data integrity
- **[File Locking](FILE_LOCKING.md)** - Advisory file locks for coordinating access between processes
- **[Batch Operations](BATCH_OPERATIONS.md)** - Concurrent processing of multiple files
- **[Path Operations](PATH_OPERATIONS.md)** - Synchronous path utilities (`rapfiles.ospath` module)
- **[API Reference](API_REFERENCE.md)** - Complete API documentation for all functions and classes

## Getting Started

- **[BUILD_AND_TEST.md](BUILD_AND_TEST.md)** - Instructions for building and testing the project locally
